item.title: Xmas trees dumped on corner and in private street, 17th January
item.description:
Private street - Indigo Mews - has a garden waste subscription but the pile has been added to by surrounding residents. Also another pile on the corner from the same. Surrounding area seems to have been cleared but not this pile.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Carysfort Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Slippery leaves not cleared, 17th January

item.title: Pothole - Unavoidable, 17th January
item.description:
Pothole in Lane 3 by traffic lights j/w Bullsmoor Lane by gully. This is a continuous recurring issue which is not being resolved properly. Please fill with Viafix, reinstate gully with C3 concrete and 60/40 HRA for gully surround.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Great Cambridge Road, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Furniture outside 70 BusheyHill road AGAIN, 17th January
item.description:
For the upteenth time, furniture is being left outside on the pavement outside number 70 Bushey Hil road. A couple of weeks ago it was a bedframe now it's some drawers and planks of wood. This is a serious problem which has gone on for years and needs to be resolved.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 72, Bushey Hill Road, Peckham, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
